description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军少将，战斗英雄。在1985年中越边境冲突的一次战斗中，身负重伤仍坚守阵地，因此在1986年被中央军委授予“战斗英雄”称号。2017年获习近平颁授首批“八一勋章”，2018年被中共中央、国务院授予“改革先锋”称号。历任多个军区及警备区职务，现任海南省军区政委。
description.en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force and a combat hero. During a battle in the Sino-Vietnamese border conflicts in 1985, he held his position despite being severely wounded, for which he was awarded the title 'Combat Hero' by the Central Military Commission in 1986. In 2017, he was awarded the inaugural 'Order of August First' by Xi Jinping, and in 2018, he was honored with the title 'Reform Pioneer' by the CPC Central Committee and the State Council. He has held various positions in multiple military regions and garrison commands, and is the current political commissar of the Hainan Provincial Military District.

en: Party and state leaders of China

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的军衔。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央总书记、中国国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的军事荣典，由中央军委决定、中央军委主席授予。
description.en: A military decoration of the People's Republic of China, decided by the Central Military Commission and awarded by its chairman.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会
en: 13th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在改革开放四十周年大会上由中共中央和国务院授予的荣誉称号。
description.en: An honorary title awarded by the CPC Central Committee and the State Council at the conference celebrating the 40th anniversary of the Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 韦昌进出生于江苏省镇江市。
description.en: Wei Changjin was born in Zhenjiang, Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 韦昌进于1983年10月加入中国人民解放军。
description.en: Wei Changjin joined the People's Liberation Army in October 1983.

position.en: Soldier of the 4th Squad, 6th Company, 595th Infantry Regiment

description.zh-cn: 在1985年7月19日的一次战斗中，韦昌进被弹片击中，全身负伤22处，左眼失明。
description.en: In a battle on July 19, 1985, Wei Changjin was hit by shrapnel, sustaining 22 wounds over his body and losing sight in his left eye.

description.zh-cn: 韦昌进作为中国人民解放军士兵参加了与越南人民军的战斗。
description.en: As a PLA soldier, Wei Changjin participated in battles against the People's Army of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1985年7月19日，越南人民军以优势兵力向韦昌进所在的阵地发起进攻，该军事行动被称为“M2”计划。
description.en: On July 19, 1985, the People's Army of Vietnam launched an attack with superior forces on the position held by Wei Changjin; this military operation was known as the "M2" Plan.

description.zh-cn: 在战斗中，韦昌进引导炮兵击退了越南人民军的8次进攻，成功守住了阵地，阻止了敌军的“M2”计划。
description.en: During the battle, Wei Changjin guided artillery to repel 8 attacks from the People's Army of Vietnam, successfully defending the position and thwarting the enemy's "M2" Plan.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，中央军委授予韦昌进“战斗英雄”荣誉称号。
description.en: In 1986, the Central Military Commission awarded Wei Changjin the honorary title of 'Combat Hero'.

description.zh-cn: 韦昌进先后6次受到党和国家领导人接见。
description.en: Wei Changjin was received by Party and state leaders on six separate occasions.

position.en: Deputy Director of the Political Department
Deputy Political Commissar and Secretary of the Discipline Inspection Commission

description.zh-cn: 不晚于2022年9月，韦昌进出任海南省军区政委。
description.en: No later than September 2022, Wei Changjin assumed the position of Political Commissar of the Hainan Provincial Military District.

description.zh-cn: 2020年7月，韦昌进晋升少将军衔。
description.en: In July 2020, Wei Changjin was promoted to the rank of Major General.

description.zh-cn: 2017年7月，中央军委主席习近平签署命令，决定首次颁授“八一勋章”。
description.en: In July 2017, Xi Jinping, Chairman of the Central Military Commission, signed an order to award the 'Order of August First' for the first time.

description.zh-cn: 韦昌进是首批“八一勋章”的10位获得者之一。
description.en: Wei Changjin was one of the 10 recipients of the inaugural 'Order of August First'.

description.zh-cn: 在2017年7月28日的授勋仪式上，习近平亲自向韦昌进颁授“八一勋章”和证书。
description.en: At the award ceremony on July 28, 2017, Xi Jinping personally presented the 'Order of August First' and its certificate to Wei Changjin.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 在改革开放四十周年大会上，中共中央决定授予100名人员“改革先锋”称号。
description.en: At the conference celebrating the 40th anniversary of the Reform and Opening-up, the CPC Central Committee decided to award the 'Reform Pioneer' title to 100 individuals.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 在改革开放四十周年大会上，国务院决定授予100名人员“改革先锋”称号。
description.en: At the conference celebrating the 40th anniversary of the Reform and Opening-up, the State Council decided to award the 'Reform Pioneer' title to 100 individuals.

description.zh-cn: 韦昌进因其贡献被授予“改革先锋”称号。
description.en: Wei Changjin was awarded the title 'Reform Pioneer' for his contributions.
